name: UnofficialCombineNews
0:
”Alexa, ask unofficial combine news for the last four flash news”
”Alexa, ask unofficial combine news for the latest gns news”
”Alexa, ask unofficial combine news for the last three sim news”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: unofficial combine news
des:
Gets the latest Sim, GNS and Flash news from SWCombine.

Sim news:
Defaults to last 3
"ask unoffical combine news for the latest sim news"
"ask unoffical combine news for the last {number} sim news"

GNS:
Defaults to last 3
"ask unoffical combine news for the latest gns news"
"ask unoffical combine news for the last {number} gns news"

Flash news:
Defaults to 5
"ask unoffical combine news for the latest flash news"
"ask unoffical combine news for the last {number} flash news"

Note: If there are less news articles than you ask for then it will just give as many as possible
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
